75577.「では <%sL_ITEM>を 頼むとしよう。\n どれを渡すか 決めてくれ。\:
So, you'll give me the <%sL_ITEM>.
Please choose which one.
<break>

75578.「<%sL_ITEM>を 頼みたいが……\n 今は 持ってないようだな。\n 他:
I'd like a <%sL_ITEM>, but it
seems you don't have one. Is there anything
else you can deliver to me?
<break>

75579.「今日は 何の用だ？\n<break>: What can I do for you today?<break>

75580.「今日の依頼は 翌朝には すべて別の依頼に\n 入れ替えておこう。\n 明日も:
All of today's requests will be replaced by
another one the next morning. I'll be back
tomorrow...<end>

75584.「仕事がほしければ 私のところへ来い。\n お前に ちょうどいい依頼を 紹介して:
You want a job, you come to me. I've got just the job for you. You go to "View Requests" and you see... If you deliver what I ask for,
you get paid on the spot, and the job is yours. I've yellowed the most lucrative requests. And if your fishing level is 16 or
above, sometimes I'll let you do special requests... Orange... Expect to be paid... I'll replace the request with a new one the
next morning, but for now, I'll take three requests a day. You won't get three jobs the first time, but as your fishing skills
improve, you'll be asked to do more. And if you come in the next morning with more than three jobs left to do, we'll increase the
number of requests by one per day...

75585.「今 頼める依頼は こんなところだ。\n この中に すぐに納品できそうなものは\:
Here's what I need right now. Is there
anything on this list that you can deliver
to me?
<break>

75586.「他に すぐ納品できそうな依頼は あるか？\n<break>:
Are there any other requests that you can
fulfill?
<break>

75587.「釣りの依頼だが\n すまない。今日はもう 間に合っている。\n また 明日にな:
I've got a fishing request, but... I can't
make it today. I'll come back tomorrow...<bw_break>

75588.「今日の依頼は 全て済んだようだな。\n 今 お前に頼める仕事は 無さそうだ。\:
I've done everything you asked me to do
today. There's nothing you can do for me now.<bw_break>

75589.<%sL_ITEM>を 納品しますか？\n釣り経験値：<%dL_EXP>P\nお:
Deliver the <%sL_ITEM>?
You'll receive <%dL_EXP> Fishing EXP and
<%dL_COIN> Fish Coins.
<yesno><close>

75669.「どうやら 報酬を受け取れないようだな。\n おさかなコインを減らしてから また:
I can't give you your reward until you spend
some of your Fish Coins first.
<bw_break>

75673.「……うむ 良い魚だ。\n 依頼の品 確かに受けとった。\n 報酬を くれてやろ:
Mhm, a great fish. It's exactly what I asked
for. Please take this reward.<end>

75674.「ちゃんと仕事用に釣って\n 持ってくるのだぞ。\n 他に 納品できそうな依頼は:
I'll be sure to bring you some fish for work.
Is there anything else you think you can
deliver?<break>

75676.「むっ 確かに依頼の品だが……\n そのデキでは 受け取れないな。\n<bw_b:
Yes, it's a request, but... But I can't
accept it in that condition.<bw_break>

75677.「ちょうど <%sL_ITEM>が\n 不足していてな。今 持ってきてくれれば\:
We just ran out of <%sL_ITEM>. If you bring
it to me now, I'll give you an extra...<break>

75678.「めずらしく <%sL_ITEM>の\n 注文が来ている。とても 難しい依頼だ。:
I have a rare request for one
<%sL_ITEM>. It's quite difficult. If you
can catch one, you'll be handsomely rewarded.
<break>

85108.「おお これは驚いた！\n こんなに大きな <%sL_ITEM>は\n なかなか:
Wow, amazing! It's not every day that you catch a <%sL_ITEM> this big!
I'll mark your rewards down. Keep up the great work.

85109.「……うむ 良い魚だ。\n しかも かなりの大物と見える。\n 少し多めに 報酬:
... Mm, good. And it's a pretty big one. I'll
give you a little extra.<end>

85300.「その魚は 自分で釣った物では ないだろう。\n 私を失望させないでくれ。\n<:
You didn't catch that fish yourself.
Please don't disappoint me.<bw_break>

85688.「ごきげんよう 若者よ\n 釣りがしたければ そこの道具屋で\n 釣りざおとルア:
Good day, young man, if you want to fish, go to your local tackle shop and buy a fishing rod and lure. You'll need both a fishing rod
and a lure, and you'll need to be near the water.If you press the "+" button, you can start fishing... Just drop your line and wait... And when you see the fish...You have to push! Even if you don't press it right away, the fish won't run away, but there's nothing to be gained by waiting
idly... Each fishing lure can be used a certain number of times... If it's broken, you can buy another one at the tool store...
Good, huh?

85689.「おお <%sL_FISH_RANK>サイズの魚を <%nL_FISH_NUM>:
Oh, you've caught <%dL_FISH_NUM> <%sL_FISH_RANK> size fish.
You've done well. I will give you a bigger bag to hold your fish in.

85690.<speed=0><pipipi_off>\nさかなぶくろが 大きくなった！\n:
<speed=0><pipipi_off>You now have a bigger fish bag!
<se_nots System 7><pipipi_on><end>

85691.「おお！ キングサイズの魚を 釣り上げたのか！\n これは 褒美をやらんわけには:
Oh! You've caught a King Size fish!
I'll have to reward you.<end>

85693.<pipipi_on>\n「新しく <%nL_MEDAL_NUM>種類 釣ったん:
<pipipi_on>You've caught <%dL_MEDAL_NUM> unique types of fish.
Here, take these <%dL_MEDAL_NUM> Mini Medals.
<end>

86566.さかなを <%dL_BAG_SIZE>匹まで 持てるようになった！: Your fish bag can now carry up to <%dL_BAG_SIZE> fish!

139144.「おお 釣り上げた <%sL_FISH_RANK>サイズの 魚の数が\n <%n:
Oh! I see that you've caught <%dL_KEIHIN_NUM> unique types
of <%sL_FISH_RANK> Size fish. Please take
these <%dL_KEIHIN_NUM2> <%sL_KEIHIN_ITEM>.

139146.「どの説明を 聞きたいんだ。\n<select_se_off>\n依頼をみる\n:
What do you want to know?
<select_se_off>
View Requests
lView Rewards
About the Fish Bag
<select_end>
<break>

139147.「釣った 魚の種類数に応じて\n 私から新たに 褒美を渡すことにした。\n 釣り:
Depending on the number of unique types of fish you catch, I will reward you.
I'll give you different rewards based on the different fish sizes: "Normal", "Big", and "King".
However to receive the Big Size rewards, you will need to be Fishing Level 19, and for King Size you will need Fishing Level 24.
If you are interested in seeing the rewards, please choose "Rewards".

139148.「お前に 新しく伝えておくことがある。\n<br>\n「釣り上げた キングサイズ:
I have some news for you. For each King Size fish you catch, I will reward you. I hope you'll continue to hone your skills.
However, you will not be able to receive these rewards until you complete my trial after reaching Fishing Level 24.
You can view these rewards by choosing "Rewards".

139350.「むむっ <%sL_BAG_TYPE>が いっぱいのようだな。\n 空きがないと:
Hmm.. your <%sL_BAG_TYPE> is full.
You'll need to free up at least one empty
slot if you want your reward.
<end>

143930.「褒美の一覧だ。『ビッグ』は 釣りレベル１９\n 『キング』は 釣りレベル２４で:
Here's the list of rewards. You'll need
Fishing Level 19 for "Big" rewards and Fishing
Level 24 for "King" rewards.
<break>

144153.「ノーマルサイズと ビッグサイズの\n 釣った魚の種類に応じて\n さかなぶくろ:
Depending on the type of fish I caught, normal size or big size, I'd switch out the fish bag for a bigger one... We've reached 30
species and 50 varieties for the normal size, and 10 species and 30 varieties for the big size. ... But for the big ones, I had to
catch 50 normal-sized ones first... There's a certain order to things...

147385.「これが 褒美の一覧だ。\n 『キングサイズの褒美』は 釣りレベル２４で\n 与:
This is the list of rewards. The King Size
rewards can be earned once your Fishing Level
reaches 24 and you complete my trial.
<break>

202795.「むむっ <%sM_item>は\n ロック中なので 納品することはできないぞ。:
Hmm... Your <%sM_item> is locked,
so you can't deliver it.
<bw_break>
